Error voluptates culpa eligendi. Hic vel totam vitae illo. Non aliquid explicabo necessitatibus unde. Sed exercitationem placeat consectetur nulla deserunt vel. Iusto corrupti dicta.', date: 'Mar 16, 2020', datetime: '2020-03-16', category: { title: 'Marketing', href: '#' }, author: { name: 'Michael Foster', role: 'Co-Founder / CTO', href: '#', imageUrl: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1519244703995-f4e0f30006d5?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&ixid=eyJhcHBfaWQiOjEyMDd9&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, }, // More posts... ] export default function options() { return (

From the blog

Learn how to grow your business with our expert advice.

{posts.map((post) => (
{post.date} {post.category.title}

{post.title}

{post.description}

{post.author.name}

{post.author.role}

))}
) }
